text: Alan Wake is a video game made by Remedy Entertainment. It is a "thriller" game and was voted best game of E3 in 2005. It was released on Xbox 360 in May 2010 and Microsoft Windows on February 16, 2012. A sequel, Alan Wake 2, was released in 2023. == Other websites == * Official site * Official forums. . * Official Community site. . title: Alan Wake
